title: Google\Cloud\Batch\V1\ServiceAccount
name: ServiceAccount
description:
Carries information about a Google Cloud service account.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.batch.v1.ServiceAccount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.email
params.description: Email address of the service account. If not specified, the default Compute Engine service account for the project will be used. If instance template is being used, the service account has to be specified in the instance template and it has to match the email field here.

methods.name: getEmail
methods.description:
Email address of the service account. If not specified, the default Compute Engine service account for the project will be used. If instance template is being used, the service account has to be specified in the instance template and it has to match the email field here.
